description:
unsupported, last update to the GIT was 2019, had 3 known bugs last I checked.  Credit to the Developer he does mention this is just a project in beta. 
I can launch it in command line, it won't produce a GUI. so I can't use it. and If it would work with command line, I would sooner use a more developed version then this one. 

NOTE: as of writing this post, there are no known GUI for OpenSource AI upscaler. Topaz labs is not supporting Linux Either. it won't run in WINE. Porting through a Cloud VM, is not cost effective, and finally Google Colab could work if you knew code. but ultimately G-colab is NOT Private and whatever you convert is now public for lifo. 

They should all collaborate on a WPM page for the GUI. it will be slow but will run on everything. then you can create hardware platform specific versions in Flutter or Vue or something. 

Same issue with NNUE for Stockfish and LC0.
